name: slds-json-schema-renderer
description: A CLI tool to generate documentation from JSON schema files

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cli && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run start -- generate --verbose -i ./test/ -o docs
scripts.prepare: shx cp -rf node_modules/@salesforce-ux/design-system/assets/icons/action-sprite/svg/symbols.svg src/frontend/assets/icons/action-sprite/svg/symbols.svg && shx cp -rf node_modules/@salesforce-ux/design-system/assets/icons/utility-sprite/svg/symbols.svg src/frontend/assets/icons/utility-sprite/svg/symbols.svg && shx cp -rf node_modules/@salesforce-ux/design-system/assets/icons/standard-sprite/svg/symbols.svg src/frontend/assets/icons/standard-sprite/svg/symbols.svg

author: PhyberApex
